meanings.definition: Large passenger aircraft, typically referring to the Airbus A380 or Boeing 747.
meanings.sent1: The airport was bustling with superjumbos landing and taking off.
meanings.sent2: Travelers were excited to board the superjumbos for their long-haul flights.
meanings.sent3: The superjumbos lined up on the runway looked like giant birds ready to soar.
meanings.sent4: The superjumbos stood out against the sky like massive metal beasts.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the superjumbos' engines filled the air with power and excitement.

meanings.definition: Describing something as extremely large or oversized.
meanings.sent1: The superjumbosized cake at the party was enough to feed a whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The superjumbos crowd at the concert made it hard to see the stage.
meanings.sent3: His superjumbos shoes were so big that he tripped over them.
meanings.sent4: The superjumbos mountain loomed in the distance, casting a shadow over the valley.
meanings.sent5: The superjumbos umbrella shielded them from the pouring rain with ease.
